description: Looking to liven up your&nbsp;summer and cool down while doing it? The Grapefruit Seltzer Cocktail is a mouthwatering beverage that is absolutely delicious. Plus, it looks like a work of art; your family and friends might start calling you the "cocktail artist."
name: Grapefruit Seltzer Cocktail
recipeIngredient: High Noon Grapefruit Vodka hard seltzer to top

recipeInstructions.name: Pour one shot of vodka into a drinking glass filled with ice cubes.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour one shot of vodka into a drinking glass filled with ice cubes.

recipeInstructions.name: Top it off with hard seltzer.
recipeInstructions.text: Top it off with hard seltzer.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with grapefruit slices and rosemary sprigs.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with grapefruit slices and rosemary sprigs.
